Text.Value: You saw nothing, or I'll crush your eyes like grapes. Got it?
*As the symbol glows, power courses through you. Authority.*
*A shiver runs across your mind... You feel sated.*
Palm the poison vial and feign innocence.
Tnak. I'll feckin' kill you!
Listen, uh, I got me some business over on the other side of yonder mountain. See you never, yeah?
*Your mind is full, bursting with ecstasy and terror. Finally, it is coming. You are becoming.*
Hey! You tryin' to slip us somethin'?
Turn around and walk away. Do not question the will of the Absolute.
Tnak. Fine. Hope Gribbo drinks it. At least then she'll shut up 'bout her bloody pigeon!

EditorData.NodeContext: Tnak (pronounced tuh-NACK) means damn it. This is spoken after the player successfully threatened them into keeping their mouth shut about the poisoning.

Text.Value: *Something stirs deep within you, hungry and alert... it's taking something you'll never get back.*
Just a drop of firewine. It'll give the brew a real kick.
O-of course. I'd never!

EditorData.NodeContext: the player just revieled themself to be of much higher standing and told the goblin not to question them.

Text.Value: *Your mind lurches, reeling suddenly as if... bitten.*
Eh. Heh. Now that's an idea. Should've thought of that myself!
*The presence deep in your mind is awake, unblinking. This is it. A single word pervades your consciousness: 'Soon'.*
You don't know who you're messin with. I'll kill you and eat you like that dwarf!
Don't think I didn't see that with yer slippery fingers.

EditorData.AnimationTags: Player shows both his empty hands, turns his head slightly and shrugs. Felix

Text.Value: *A strange symbol glows, marked on their flesh, and something within you stirs in response.*
I'll slip a knife between your ribs if you don't piss off.
Don't be stupid. You can barely see straight.
What-cha... this guy's some booyahg! He's tryna magick me!
What-cha... this woman's some booyahg! She's tryna magick me!
What-cha... this'n's some booyahg! They're tryna magick me!

EditorData.NodeContext: BOO-yawg. (w is silent, as in yawn) Booyahg means magic user

Text.Value: *Your blood runs quicker, feeding the gnawing absence at the centre of your mind.*
*A shadow swims across your vision, and a familiar voice tells you to be calm. You are loved.*
Like hells. I don't know what you're gettin' at, but answer the question. What were you doin'?
This guy's tryin' to poison us! Kill him!
This gal's tryin' to poison us! Kill her!
This one's tryin' to poison us! Kill 'em!
Read their mind.
Like hells. That ain't firewine!
Urk. The world's spinnin'... Heh. Her horns look like snakes, all wriggly. Damn, this is some good beer.
Urk. The world's spinnin'... Heh. His horns look like snakes, all wriggly. Damn, this is some good beer.
Urk. The world's spinnin'... Heh. The stones look alive, all wriggly. Damn, this is some good beer.

EditorData.NodeContext: We are reading the goblin's mind, so these are their thoughts.

Text.Value: A lethal poison. Enough to take the lot of you down.
*The mark glows, but you feel nothing in response. Your illithid power is beyond reach until you rest.*
Turn around and walk away. Do not question the will of the Absolute.
Drink must be tellin' on me. Guess I need some more. Heh.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Player] shows both his empty hands, turns his head slightly and shrugs. Felix

Synopsis: A nearby goblin saw the player poison the vat of beer and confronts them.
